contact.text: Have another question? Contact me by

items.question: What is MainFocus?
items.answer: MainFocus is an app that helps you improve your productivity using Pomodoro timers and AI to track your focus. It awards points for staying focused and lets you compete with friends.

items.question: How does MainFocus track my focus?
items.answer: MainFocus uses your device's camera to analyze your focus state with AI. The app ensures privacy by processing all data locally without storing video or personal data.
